nmap.title: Nmap Scan Results
nmap.description: Nmap is a network scanning tool used to identify open ports, running services, and potential vulnerabilities.

nikto.title: Nikto Web Server Scan
nikto.description: Nikto is a web server scanner that detects potential security issues such as misconfigurations and vulnerabilities.

theharvester.title: The Harvester Results
theharvester.description: The Harvester collects email addresses, subdomains, and other open-source information from search engines and public sources.
